description: Enterprise techniques used by Axiom, ATT&CK group G0001 v1.0
name: Axiom (G0001)

techniques.comment: [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) has been observed using SQL injection to gain access to systems.

The [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) group has used other forms of obfuscation, include commingling legitimate traffic with communications traffic so that network streams appear legitimate. Some malware that has been used by [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) also uses steganography to hide communication in PNG image files.
[Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) has been known to dump credentials.
The [Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) group is known to have used RDP during operations.
[Axiom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0001) actors have been known to use the Sticky Keys replacement within RDP sessions to obtain persistence.
